provider.name: Anyscale
provider.description: Anyscale Private Endpoints allows you to seamlessly serve the most popular open source large language models (LLMs) in your cloud environment without compromising on performance. As a result, you can concentrate on customizing your LLM-powered applications while adhering to the highest security standards.
provider.note: Effective August 1, 2024 Anyscale Endpoints API will be available exclusively through the fully Hosted Anyscale Platform. Multi-tenant access to LLM models will be removed.

models.title: Chat Completions
models.description: Portkey supports the chat completions API for Anyscale models

portkeyPythonSDK.description: Use Portkey Python SDK to make text calls to Anyscale chat completions models
portkeyPythonSDK.codeExample: sample python code for Llama-2-7b-chat-hf text call on Anyscale

integrationViaVirtualKey.description: Integrate Anyscale using Portkey's virtual key system

inline.text: Get your API key from Anyscale and add it to Portkey to create a virtual key.
inline.description: You can get your Anyscale API key from the Anyscale console [here](https://console.anyscale.com/).

portkeyPythonSDK.description: Initialize Portkey with the virtual key in Python
portkeyPythonSDK.codeExample: sample python SDK code for Llama-2-7b-chat-hf chat completions call on Anyscale using virtual key

portkeyNodeSDK.description: Initialize Portkey with the virtual key in Node.js
portkeyNodeSDK.codeExample: sample node.js SDK code for Llama-2-7b-chat-hf chat completions call on Anyscale using virtual key
